Process Serving

Legal documents need to be served correctly—the first time. Our experienced team ensures your paperwork is delivered promptly and professionally throughout Park City, Summit County, Utah, California, and Montana.

Professional Document Service You Can Trust

When legal proceedings depend on proper service of process, you need professionals who understand the requirements and get it done right. MILLERGROUP Intelligence has been serving legal documents throughout the Mountain West for nearly 30 years.

Our certified process servers handle everything from routine civil papers to challenging high-profile cases with the same level of professionalism and attention to detail.

Documents We Serve

Civil Process

Summons and complaints, subpoenas, writs, orders to show cause, restraining orders, and all civil court documents.

Family Law Documents

Divorce petitions, custody papers, child support documents, domestic relations filings, and family court paperwork.

Small Claims

Small claims court summons and related documents for cases in Utah, California, and Montana.

Eviction Notices

Three-day notices, unlawful detainer summons, and eviction-related legal documents.

Commercial & Business Documents

Contract disputes, business litigation papers, commercial evictions, and corporate legal documents.

Our Service Coverage

We provide reliable process serving throughout:

  • Park City & Summit County, Utah: Complete coverage of our home territory with same-day and rush service available
  • Utah Statewide: Service throughout Salt Lake County, Utah County, Wasatch County, and all other Utah jurisdictions
  • California: Professional process serving in key California markets
  • Montana: Reliable service throughout Montana communities

Why Choose Us

Experienced & Certified

Our process servers are fully certified and trained in the specific requirements of each jurisdiction we serve. We stay current on changing regulations and court rules.

Fast Turnaround

We understand legal deadlines. Same-day service is often available in Park City and Summit County, with rush service options throughout our coverage areas.

Verified Proof of Service

Every service includes detailed, court-ready proof of service documentation. We provide accurate declarations that stand up to legal scrutiny.

Persistent & Professional

Difficult to locate individuals? We employ skip-tracing techniques and multiple service attempts to successfully complete even the most challenging assignments.

Discreet Service

We handle every service with professionalism and discretion, particularly in sensitive family law and high-profile matters.

Competitive Pricing

Straightforward, competitive rates with no hidden fees. We provide upfront pricing and deliver exceptional value.

How It Works

1. Contact Us: Reach out via phone, email, or our online contact form with details about your service needs.

2. Provide Documents: Send us the documents to be served along with any available address information and recipient details.

3. We Handle Service: Our certified process servers locate the individual and complete service according to all legal requirements.

4. Receive Proof of Service: You'll receive completed, notarized proof of service documentation ready for court filing.

Service Requirements & Deadlines

Different types of cases have different service requirements and deadlines. Our experienced team understands these nuances and ensures compliance with all applicable rules, including:

  • Personal service vs. substituted service requirements
  • Timeline requirements for specific case types
  • Special service rules for government entities
  • Out-of-state service protocols
  • Publication service when necessary

Need Documents Served?

Contact us today to discuss your process serving needs. We're ready to handle your service with professionalism and efficiency.

Get Started

For urgent service needs, call us directly at the number on our contact page.
